div.a: CSCSHC Closed For Rest of School Year Due to COVID-19

span.p: Per orders by Indiana Governor Eric Holcomb, CSCSHC will be closed until through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year due to concerns over COVID-19 (coronavirus).

a.title: Click to read more about: CSCSHC Closed For Rest of School Year Due to COVID-19

div.a: Read More about CSCSHC Closed For Rest of School Year Due to COVID-19

span.p: Breakfast and lunch are available for any child under the age of 18. Please click this link to learn how to get free meals for your child.

a.title: Click to read more about: Food Service Options for Families

div.a: Read More about Food Service Options for Families

span.p: Any student who is five years old on or before August 1, 2020, is eligible for Kindergarten at Southern Hancock.

a.title: Click to read more about: Kindergarten Registration is Open

div.a: Read More about Kindergarten Registration is Open
Out of District Transfer Application Process Now Open

span.p: Families who live outside of Southern Hancock and wish to enroll can do so by submitting an application before the July 24th, 2020 deadline.

a.title: Click to read more about: Out of District Transfer Application Process Now Open

div.a: Read More about Out of District Transfer Application Process Now Open
